name: Buying Milk.
description:
You play as a drug addicted individual
You live in an apartment in the middle of the city
You live with your parents
You, killed someone

Ending List:
> Buy milk ending
> AFK ending
> Soda (Diabetes) ending
> Wedding ending
> Car ending
> Complete ending
> Death ending

W / A / S / D - Move  
Left Shift - Run  
E - Interact  
Q - Unhide (while hiding)  
F - Flashlight (if equipped)

I know this game is not scary, but I would not be responsible if:
- the player had a heart attack while playing this game
- players vomited from seeing the characters in this game
